Cox 's line.;;; --Freight Boats to Lynchburg three times A week-- Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays.;;; Boat Tempest, Capt. Thos. Emett.;;; Boat Merchant, Capt. Gro. C. Layne,;;; Boat Bristol, Capt. Chas. J. Johnson.;;; Boat J. J. Irby, Capt. Wm. F. Cleveland.;;; Boat Fame, Capt. Wm. H. Parsons.;;; Boat Olivia, Capt. J. J. Peters.;;; These Boats are all of the first class, commanded by careful and experienced Captains, and leave promptly as advertised.;;; The subscriber thankful for past favors, begs a continuance of the same.;;; Wm. P. Cox, Agent, At the Shed, Dock st., in rear of old Gas Works.
